header.name: chaos/preprocessor/logical/nor.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a logical NOR operator.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to the logical NOR of its operands.

usage.param: The left operand. Valid values range from 0 to .
The right operand. Valid values range from 0 to .

macro.para: If p and q are both 0, this macro expands to 1. Otherwise, it expands to 0.
This macro performs a Boolean conversion on each operand. If this conversion is undesireable, may be used instead.
This macro is lazy. If p is non-zero, q is not evaluated.
